text:
EnaM paqSavO# Buq~jjantaq upa#tiShThEraqnq. yanna sa#BiMqndyAd-baqhava# EnaM paqSavO&Bu#~jjantaq upa# tiShThEraqn mana#sAq saM bA#dhata uqBaya#M karOti baqhava# Eqvaina#M paqSavO# Buq~jjantaq upa# tiShThanta unnEqtaryu#pahaqvami#cCantEq ya Eqva tatra# sOmapIqthastamEqvAva# rundhata uttaravEqdyAM niva#pati paqSavOq vA u#ttaravEqdiH paqSavO# hAriyOjaqnIH paqSuShvEqva paqSUn prati# ShThApayanti ( ) || 35
(aqSrIqNAq - daqntarA#dhAnAByAq - malpA$H - sthApayanti) (A9)
